articles.title: Watch: Wriddhiman Saha Stunned As David Warner Survives Despite Ball Hitting Stumps During DC vs GT .. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: A delivery from Mohammed Shami brushed David Warner's off-stump, but the bails did not light up or move as the Australian got a reprieve
articles.content: Strange things often happen in cricket, just as in life. One such thing happened in the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2023 game between Delhi Capitals and Gujarat Titans at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in … [+1946 chars]
